recipesJson.name: Stram
recipesJson.author: HowieDIY
recipesJson.description: My simple take on strawberries and cream.   More like straight strawberry ice cream.  Well balanced, but still sweet.  Steep:  good as SnV, better a week in.

reviews.text: I really like this, and keep some mixed up for when I want a strawberry but not a strawb milk or cheesecake.  It's perfect for when I want something a touch lighter.
Excellent recipe. It surprised me to be honest. I only mixed a 15ml, forgot about it. I found it in the back of the cabinet and tried it. I really love it!
